name: Demo: Medieval Adventure
description:
The 3 of us:

Hasciar Vlad-Andrei

Rucareanu Catalin-Stefan

Zamfir Mihai-Cristian

have made a team for the hackathon from EA which had the theme: "it's not supposed to work that way"

if you are interested in the presentation made for the competition ti is listed as documentation under the price of $2.00, where you can see what we have in mind for the future of the game.
